content: {"version":2,"machineId":"9296748a-ac46-4fbb-a7ea-c45a030e4ca8","content":"{\"windows\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaultsauto[]\\n[\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+oem_6 ctrl+oem_6\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.toggleZenMode\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+k z\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.toggleZenMode\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"pausebreak pausebreak\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.exitZenMode\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"inZenMode\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"escape escape\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.exitZenMode\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"inZenMode\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+l\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.focusFirstEditorGroup\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+1\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.focusFirstEditorGroup\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+oem_1\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.focusSecondEditorGroup\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+2\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.focusSecondEditorGroup\\\"\\n    }\\n]\"}"}
